headline: Show HN: EchoRecipes – A Virtual Assistant for Cooking
description:
Hey HN! I'm Bradley the creator of Echo Recipes a virtual assistant for cooking. Echo reads recipes out loud and reacts to voice commands allowing you to focus on cooking.

Echo is a passion project to help me get better at cooking. Right now it's a minimum viable product of reading recipes out loud, responding to basic voice commands, and a simple interface to organize your recipes.

I would love any feedback, questions, advice, or suggestions that you have.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: EchoRecipes - 一个烹饪的虚拟助手
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: EchoRecipes - 一個烹飪的虛擬助手
description_zh-Hans: 嗨，HN! 我是布拉德利，Echo Recipes的创造者，它是烹饪的虚拟助手。Echo可以大声读出菜谱，并对语音命令作出反应，使你能够专注于烹饪。现在，它是一个最小的可行产品，即大声阅读食谱，响应基本的语音命令，以及一个简单的界面来组织你的食谱。
description_zh-Hant: 嗨，HN! 我是布拉德利，Echo Recipes的創造者，它是烹飪的虛擬助手。Echo可以大聲讀出菜譜，並對語音命令作出反應，使你能夠專注於烹飪。現在，它是一個最小的可行產品，即大聲閱讀食譜，響應基本的語音命令，以及一個簡單的界面來組織你的食譜。
